name: Hurricane
description: A storm has been brewing. Itâ€™s Hurricane. Flair and excitement abounds with this fast moving spirited brush script. There are three regular styles incorporated into the PRO version of the this font, plus graphics to add an extra breeze to your work. The Script stylistic set swaps the caps out for the more flourished uppercase. It comes with Latin Character sets including Western, Central, and Vietnamese language support. To contribute, see github.com/googlefonts/hurricane .
author: Robert Leuschke
